Dlidlam



Dlidlam (interior house post, in the form of a grizzly bear) from Gwa'yasdam's, Gilford Island, BC, said to be by Awalaskinis
Taken Saturday, August 09, 2014, 12:26:52PM. Original image size: 2592x3888, 2.1Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS 40D, 1/400s@ F2.8, ISO 800, 50mm f/1.4 (80mm equiv)
PS CS5 Fill40 B25 Con-25 CVS 40:40:20, LS15, Profile, USM 20:20
